LanguageData.PowerFunneling.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between -3 and +6 mood for 6 days. The selected colonist will also get a buff of varying degree (depends on quality and chance) for 15 days
LanguageData.PowerFunneling.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.PowerFunneling.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.PowerFunneling.outcomeChances.1.label: Bad
LanguageData.PowerFunneling.outcomeChances.1.descript: The {0} was bad, but our champion will still be of help.
LanguageData.PowerFunneling.outcomeChances.2.label: Satisfying
LanguageData.PowerFunneling.outcomeChances.2.descript: The {0} was satisfying. Our champion will keep us safe.
LanguageData.PowerFunneling.outcomeChances.3.label: Spectacular
LanguageData.PowerFunneling.outcomeChances.3.descript: The {0} was spectacular! Our champion is unstoppable.
